actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Governmental Affairs.
Committee on Governmental Affairs requested executive comment from Environmental Protection Agency; GSA; GAO; Office of Federal Procurement Policy; Defense Department; Energy Department; HUD.
Committee on Governmental Affairs received executive comment from Office of Federal Procurement Policy.

official_title: A bill to prohibit Federal agencies from soliciting offers from, awarding contracts to, extending contracts with, or approving subcontracts for, any person who has been debarred or suspended by another agency.

summary.text: Prohibits any Federal agency from soliciting offers from, entering or extending contracts with, or approving or extending subcontracts for any person who has been debarred or suspended from procurement activities of another agency, except for a compelling reason as determined by the agency head. Requires the agency head to notify the Administrator of the General Services Administration of such a determination. Directs the Administrator to maintain a file of such notices.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit Federal agencies from soliciting offers from, awarding contracts to, extending contracts with, or approving subcontracts for, any person who has been debarred or suspended by another agency.
